author: Xcoo, Inc.
title: casmi - 2D/3D visualization for Java
keywords: casmi, visualization, 2D visualization, 3D visualization, Java, Clojure
description: casmi is a visualization library for Java. casmi supports 2D/3D realtime rendering based on OpenGL. With assembling graphics primitives, you can easily design scene layouts. Smooth tween animations and scene sequencing functions add rich UI/UX on your application.
